title: Hello Mini-Games app showcases localised, branded mini-games with a competitive edge at DMEXCO: Cologne
text:
Show attendees offered a free round at ‘Spin The Wheel’ mini-game to win prizes
Germany – M-BIZ Global, a leading provider of mobile game solutions, announced that their newly launched mobile app, Hello Mini-Games, will be showcasing at DMEXCO in Cologne, Germany (Hall 6.1, B035) from 16-17 September 2015.A giant touch screen monitor will feature one of their mini-games, ‘Spin The Wheel’ and show attendees will be offered a free ‘spin’ to win prizes at their booth.
Hello Mini-Games ( www.hellominigames.com ) is a social mini-game app which allows players to play 1:1 matches, earn loyalty points and win prizes. In addition, players can create their own groups with family and friends to compete for ranks on a group leaderboard. Country-specific mini game event competitions are a key highlight within the app, with players competing to outrank one another on the leaderboard and potentially win prizes such as local brands’ gift vouchers.The mini game app is now available on Google Play , with the iOS version slated to launch later in the year.
The app further serves as a complementary publishing channel alongside M-BIZ’s latest venture - Branded Mini-Games, a HTML5 mobile marketing solution that allows brands to gamify their advertising campaigns with social competitions. Brands can select from multiple game templates with different game mechanics, such as sports, quizzes, arcade-style and customise the mini game graphics to their own brand’s look and feel.
Massoud Loodin, Head of Business, M-BIZ Global said: “New content is constantly being churned out to keep consumers interested in short and snappy games that keep them entertained on the move. In this day and age, it’s not enough to just provide gaming entertainment content, but to incorporate social elements that allow users to feel connected to other users and to offer incentives in doing so.”
Hello Mini-Games is currently being launched worldwide in multiple languages–English, Korean, French and Vietnamese, with additional languages – German, Russian, Turkish, Thai being added in subsequent months.
About Hello Mini-Games (M-BIZ Global)
Hello Mini-Games is a product of M-BIZ Global a leading provider of mobile game solutions. Since 2005 it has enabled companies in the mobile gaming industry to expand their customer base and increase their conversions through end-to-end services and strong value propositions. Other M-BIZ products include Branded Mini-Games, Pocket Arena and TryNBuy embedding solutions that are available for both Smartphones and feature phones. M-BIZ Global is headquartered in Luzern, Switzerland. For more info, visit http://www.mbizglobal.net/
